channel.title: Marijuana Facts
channel.description: Does anyone have a link to that Marijuana facts website? The one that tells the truth about how there are no reported deaths from marijuana and stuff like that. My friend keeps bothering me telling me I'm going to die -.-

item.title: Marijuana Facts
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

Pulmonary hazards of smoking marijuana as compared with tobacco - TC Wu, DP Tashkin, B Djahed, and JE Rose
http://content.nejm.org/cgi/content/abstract/318/6/347

The residual cognitive effects of heavy marijuana use in college students - H. G. Pope Jr and D. Yurgelun-Todd

http://jama.ama-assn.org/cgi/content/abstract/275/7/521

There is some good science on it, but not very much. Don’t take public funded science research too seriously, and when they only provide you with an abstract fo the actual paper be wary. None the less here is some fact. But Erowid will be just as usefull to you, if not more so.

Read full topic
